New Records: Pakistan broke their World Cup losing streak against India with a 10-wicket win.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi dismissed Rohit Sharma with a swinging delivery.
Shaheen Shah Afridi dismissed KL Rahul with a similar delivery.
Virat Kohli scored 57 runs to help India reach 151 for 7.
Babar Azam scored an unbeaten 68 runs.
Mohammad Rizwan scored an unbeaten 78 runs off 55 balls.
Pakistan won the match by 10 wickets.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli acknowledged that Pakistan outplayed and outclassed India.
Babar Azam expressed pride in Pakistan's performance and mentioned that they were not thinking about their previous record against India.
